EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent when Change Request is approved.
EmailTemplate.name: Change Request Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Change Request Approved for Application #{!Application__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification of Change Request# {!ChangeRequest__c.Name} approval.
This email is to notify you that Change Request# {!GO__AmendmentRequest__c.Name} for your Grant {!ChangeRequest__c.Award__c} has been approved.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
